resources.string: It\'s a social application where all the members are completely anonymous. However, to ease with the visual and temporary anonymous identification, you are asked to select a nickname. You will own the nickname as long as you don\'t dump your account. If you dump your account, you cannot use the nickname again. A lot of features are yet to come like gif , video sharing, anonymous confessions, pdf notes sharing. Be on a look out for updates. Thanks!
